# emoji-checkbox-component

## Usage

```html
<emoji-checkbox-component name="my-checkbox" checked="false">
  <checkmark-component check-true="1F315" check-false="1F311" />
  <label-component> Some Label </label-component>
</emoji-checkbox-component>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                   | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked` | `checked` | The initial state of checkbox | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `name`    | `name`    | Checkbox name                 | `string`  | `undefined` |
